title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: There are errors on the report page: There are error(s) in Table: table8Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)). The error details state that there was an error in data type conversion and that the value could not be converted to a Date.
EB: The filter should work without any errors when the value new Date('3/2/2005') is used. The report page should display the filtered data correctly.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table into the report.
3. Create a filter based on the datetime column.
4. In the value1 field of the filter, input the following value: new Date('3/2/2005').
